thread.title: Watch 'Hamilton' stars tweak lyrics to 'America the Beautiful' at Super Bowl 2017
thread.title_full: Watch 'Hamilton' stars tweak lyrics to 'America the Beautiful' at Super Bowl 2017

author: Joe Lynch
title: Watch 'Hamilton' stars tweak lyrics to 'America the Beautiful' at Super Bowl 2017
text:
Watch 'Hamilton' stars tweak lyrics to 'America the Beautiful' at Super Bowl 2017 
Hamilton stars Phillipa Soo, Renee Elise Goldsberry and Jasmine Cephas Jones -- the Schuyler Sisters in the Tony-winning Broadway smash -- performed "America the Beautiful" at Super Bowl LI on Sunday (Feb. 5) night. 
Prior to Luke Bryan's stirring rendition of the National Anthem, the Schuyler Sisters took to the field to deliver a gorgeous, intricately harmonized version of the 19th century patriotic classic at Super Bowl 51 before the New England Patriots squared off against the Atlanta Falcons. They even tweaked one of the lyrics to be a tad more inclusive, singing "And crown thy good with brotherhood, and sisterhood, from sea to shining sea."
Watch it below.
